name: Eurasia
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: This will be another victory for Eurasia.
attacked: Are the Atlanticists and their minions challenging us? Never mind, we're ready to meet him.
defeated: Haven't we made enough efforts to make our dream come true?
introduction: Greetings, I am the embodiment of the will and the people of Eurasia. Let's discuss our meeting in more detail.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: You have proved your right to independence. Let's end this war.
tradeRequest: The riches of Eurasia are right in front of you, what do you have to offer us?
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
